I'm glad you're excited about trying out the Schmidt's Charcoal + Magnesium Deodorant! And I completely agree with you about the importance of making conscious choices in our daily lives to reduce our impact on the environment. Every small change we make can add up to make a big difference.

It's great that the Facebook post about climate change sparked a conversation and made you think about your own impact. Raising awareness and having open discussions about environmental issues is crucial for inspiring change.

Remember, it's all about making progress, not perfection. Every small step we take towards living more sustainably can have a positive impact. And who knows, you might just inspire others to make changes too!

So, go ahead and give the Schmidt's Charcoal + Magnesium Deodorant a try. Your skin and the planet will thank you!
